DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study describe morbidity , mortality , disability survival rate Shanghai adolescents child cancer diagnose since January 2002 .
DOC.brief_title: Shanghai Epidemiology Study Adolescents Children With Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator collect information adolescent child diagnose cancer Shanghai since January 2002 , include name , gender , date birth , diagnosis date , disease diagnosis , residence address last follow-up time status ( survival/death ) . The type cancer include malignant tumor Acute Lymphocytic Leukemia , Acute Myeloid Leukemia , Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma , Hodgkin Lymphoma , central nervous system tumor , Neuroblastoma , Wilms tumor . Then investigator would analyze morbidity , mortality , disability survival rate .
DOC.criteria: 019 yearold child adolescent . Diagnosed cancer Shanghai since January 2002 . Patients lose followup . Patient 's death n't cause cancer complication accident car accident , fell great height .
